gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.map
Interface MappingDataManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
MiddlePanelJGraphController
public interface MappingDataManager

Defines the interface that an implementation of UI mapping data manager needs to provide to facilitate other parties to take real actions against underline mapping data. Current implementation is a JGraph based controller, but it may change at later time. This interface will then help isolate the underline implementation technology from back-end mapping handling.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:24 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $
